name: Volatile Contact
description:
Volatile Contact is a twin-stick shooter in which the player controls a mercenary on a rescue mission off a recently discovered planet. In order to fulfil their mission they got to shoot their way through overgrown enemies and reach the objective before life-support cuts out.

 

If you are a fan of a sci-fi space shooter and fast gameplay, then this game is a try to go.

In Volatile Contact you are an ex private of the U.S. army who got retired and now works as a field technician. You work your way around old space stations, ruins and evil plants, that overtook the planet “Maguua AX2”. Your mission is to discover what happened to the old crew and why there is no sign of life anymore.

A hidden lore wrapped around a 3D, low poly, top down, dungeon crawler with an interesting glowing environment and different types of plants and enemies. Discover the different areas, defeat the dangers that surrounds you and help the planet to recover.

 

Gameplay Controls:

Keyboard:

  • WASD – for Moving
  • Shift/Right Mouse/Space – for Dashing
  • Left Mouse – for Shooting
  • Z – for Barters Menu (Cheats, just so you can test stuff out)
  • ESC – Main menu

Gamepad: 

  • Left Stick - Move
  • Right stick -Aim (shoots automatically)
  • Any shoulder button or trigger - Dash
